definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The ordinate scale is linear in decibels.
sentences.chinese: 縱座標比例尺以分貝爲單位是線性的。

sentences.english: Please put the number on the end ordinate.
sentences.chinese: 請把數字填入縱座標中。

sentences.english: Determines the baseline y-coordinate of the first line of text of the component.
sentences.chinese: 該屬性決定該控件第一行文字的基線縱座標。
